casepack.title: Evolution Kernel — 5 Representative Organisms (Tier-2)
casepack.description: Evolution domain closure demonstrating GCD kernel applied to 5 representative organisms across the tree of life. Verifies Tier-1 identities (F+ω=1, IC≤F, IC=exp(κ)) and regime classification for organisms spanning bacteria to humans.

run_intent.notes: This CasePack exercises the evolution domain closure with 5 organisms: E. coli (prokaryote anchor), Drosophila (invertebrate model), Quercus (plant), Latimeria (living fossil), Homo sapiens (behavioral complexity extreme). All 5 demonstrate F+ω=1 by construction, IC≤F (integrity bound), and IC=exp(κ) (log-integritas). All 5 are classified Collapse regime due to channel heterogeneity — this is structurally honest, not failure.
